name: Get Glazed 1.02
description:
You play a poor bagel struggling in a systemic class war between the sweet and savory.

Climb you way up to the top and go beyond the limits of your birthright that has condemned you in this cruel world.  

Get G L A Z E D or crumble trying.

Feel free to comment about any bugs :) We're always looking to improve and learn new things. For a smoother experience, download the Win or Mac version 

=========================CONTROLS=========================

Arrow keys for movement

Press Z to roll.      Roll into the pink donuts to propel you upwards and reset your roll

===========================Update==========================

1.01 - Change level 1 & 2 Layout to introduce player mechanics more smoothly. Added more visual feedback when dashing. Added parallax to backdrop. Tweaked water reflection shader. **Tried fixing the bug where after dieing player position is constantly reset with jump.**

1.02 - Fixed game breaking bug where pressing Space bar resets player position after dying. Added checkpoints. Added UI on intro. Added animations to smores. Added animation at end of game for glazing
